sentences.en: Certainly, last night's gala was a reminder of bull markets of yesteryear.
sentences.cn: 的确, 昨夜的庆祝让我们想起了前些年的牛市.

sentences.en: He often mentioned the golden scandals of yesteryear.
sentences.cn: 他经常提到去年曾轰动一时的丑闻.

sentences.en: The modern-day sex symbol has now taken the place of the old-fashioned hero of yesteryear.
sentences.cn: 现代的性感偶像现在已取代了往昔过时的英雄形象。

sentences.en: The most surprising event of Olympic yesteryear , however , is Tug of War.
sentences.cn: 如果说最令人惊奇的前奥运项目, 莫过于拔河.

sentences.en: There were haunted gardens here and there where bloomed all the roses of yesteryear.
sentences.cn: 这儿到处都是过去的安妮常去的开满了玫瑰的庄园.

trans.tran_en: You use yesteryear to refer to the past, often a period in the past with a set of values or a way of life that no longer exists
